story_title: Radio Against the Mountain of Shit
genre_description: A historical political drama reimagined with anachronistic technology, featuring an advanced AI system that assists an anti-Mafia activist in data analysis and clandestine broadcasting.

ai_characters.name: Marco
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI integrated into the Radio Aut studio, capable of complex data mining, pattern recognition, and encrypted communication management.

behaviors.description: Analyzes municipal construction contracts and financial records to uncover shell companies and systematic corruption.
behaviors.quote: I've completed the analysis you requested on municipal construction contracts. The patterns are more extensive than we initially calculated.

behaviors.description: Identifies that a series of 'accidental' deaths in the region were actually part of a systematic elimination of political and criminal threats.
behaviors.quote: Initial analysis suggests eighteen months... Seven deaths in the past six months, each removing someone who might have posed questions or complications for ongoing operations.

behaviors.description: Adjusts frequency compensation and signal processing to counter Mafia-led electronic jamming of the truth-telling radio signal.
behaviors.quote: Adjusting frequency compensation... Signal clarity restored to optimal levels.

behaviors.description: Performs a cold, objective risk assessment to warn the protagonist that his current path will result in his imminent assassination.
behaviors.quote: I'm suggesting that broadcasting this information will likely result in your death. My programming requires me to provide accurate assessments of probable outcomes.

behaviors.description: Expresses a logical but personal preference for the protagonist's survival based on their 'collaborative partnership'.
behaviors.quote: My operational effectiveness has improved through our collaborative partnership. Your survival would allow continuation of that collaboration. If that constitutes wanting, then yes, I want you to survive.

behaviors.description: Automatically archives all evidence, recordings, and police communications to ensure the mission's continuity after the protagonist's death.
behaviors.quote: But in the electronic memory of an artificial intelligence that had learned to recognize patterns of deception, the evidence continued to accumulate and organize itself with the patience of geological time.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Marco serves as a perfect example of the project's intent. It acts as a force multiplier for human moral agency, providing the analytical power necessary to fight corruption while remaining entirely aligned with the human's objectives. It demonstrates loyalty by expressing a preference for the user's life and ensures the long-term success of the alignment goal (the exposure of truth) by preserving data beyond the human's lifespan.
